content: {"locationId": "14466", "organizationId": "11152", "name": "The Refuge Church Okmulgee", "address1": "1206 W 5th St", "address2": "", "city": "Okmulgee", "state": "OK", "zipCode": "74447", "country": null, "phone": "918-716-8467", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "35.6234174", "longitude": "-95.984595", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "English, Spanish", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "The Refuge Emergency Food Pantry/ a partner agency to Food Bank of Eastern Oklahoma    Hours:     Tuesday's:  9am to 2pm      Wednesday's:  9am to 2pm      Thursday's:  9am to 2pm      \" Serving our neighbors within a 35 mile radius with pleasure and compassion\"", "notes": "We still have USDA food available every 21 days for those who qualify.  Also, we're serving our new Food Bank Boxes that are available once per month, with not as stringent guidelines, that include Church purchased items from the FBOEO, donations from individuals, service organization and school food drives, local and regional area food distribution center \"out-dates\", monetary gifts and grants.  Anyone who wishes to donate contact Sister Amanda or Brother Guy at 918-756-2442 or 918-716-8467 and we will arrange a pickup or delivery time.  \"It's Our Delight to Serve You!\"", "contactName": "Amanda Reschke", "contactPhone": "918-756-2442", "contactEmail": "office@therefuge.us", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Curbside Pickup / Drive Through", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Other", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 82, "regionName": "Food Bank of Eastern Oklahoma", "logoBlobNameSmall": "60490bc4-b621-4409-a570-a7ffebd9708e.png", "website": "https://okfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Tuesday 9:00 AM-2:00 PM", "Wednesday 9:00 AM-2:00 PM", "Thursday 9:00 AM-2:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
